message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product at a premium price of $20,000. I believe it holds significant value that justifies this price.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe the product is worth less than $15,000 to me. I am willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.
Bob, I understand your perspective on the price. However, the value of this product is quite high, and I can't let it go for anything less than $18,000. This is my final offer.
Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still not willing to exceed $12,000. I hope we can come to an agreement closer to that amount.
